svg.text: ANALYTICS DASHBOARD - WEB VITALS AND EVENTS

g.text: If analytics blocked: Site continues functioning normally. No errors shown. Events silently discarded. Performance unaffected.
Core Web Vitals (LCP, FCP, CLS, TTFB, INP) automatically
measured and sent to GA4. Dev mode logs to browser.
Theme changes, form submits, PWA installs, search
queries, and errors tracked as custom GA4 events.
Visual indicators show connection status, script loading,
and ad blocker detection. All status real-time updated.
Site functions normally when analytics blocked. No errors
shown, events silently discarded, performance unaffected.

svg.text: LCP/FCP/CLS/TTFB/INP | Custom events | Async loading | Ad blocker resilience | Silent failure | No performance impact
